# Truth's Agent (Trait)
## Overview
**Truthâ€™s Agent**: You are skilled at weeding out information. You gain a +1 trait bonus on all [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks made to gather information and all [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local) checks. [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local) is always a class skill for you. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
